content: I will agree with you on Point one. Buying the raw Opium does not constitute an offence, for the US or any other nation, it is the base component for many legal applications within the pharmaceutical industry, and at present there is an Opiate shortage. Two birds with one stone? I think so. The main problem with operations in Afghanistan is the lack of unity of effort. Have a simple goal and ALL work towards that end. Therby hangs success, this is a winable conflict if the rules of COIN are followed.
